LanguageData.StoneArrow.label: stone arrow
LanguageData.StoneArrow.description: A sharpened stone is attached as an arrow head. Cuts exposed tissue fairly well but is ineffective against any kind of armor.
LanguageData.MetallicArrow.label: metallic arrow
LanguageData.MetallicArrow.description: The arrow head is made from steel to enhance armor penetration.
LanguageData.ExplosiveArrow.label: explosive arrow
LanguageData.ExplosiveArrow.description: Fitted with a explosive head to make additional explosion damage.
LanguageData.BalistaBolt.label: balista bolt
LanguageData.BalistaBolt.description: The balista bolt head is made from steel to enhance armor penetration.
LanguageData.StoneBall.label: stone ball
LanguageData.StoneBall.description: A stone ball used for catapult.
LanguageData.ExplosiveBall.label: explosive ball
LanguageData.ExplosiveBall.description: An explosive ball used for catapult.
LanguageData.Poison.label: poison
LanguageData.Shock.label: shock
